To quote @larrywilmore , "saying the word gay doesn't make you gay, it's not like Beetlejuice." I'm dismayed that my two favorite teams (Nats & BoSox) basically danced around the fact that #SpiritDay  is SPECIFICALLY to support  LGBTQ + youths.

The Red Sox are what I'd call tier 1A. They QTd the MLB tweet (which explicitly stated " LGBTQ  youth") and linked to their #SpiritDay  partnership with @FenwayHealth .
